resources.string: The NGO Instituto Materno Infantil Professor Fernando Figueira is a social organization located in Recife, PE. Among the activities of the NGO we have Hospital and Emergency Care Preventive Education for Health Medical Research See below for the NGOs data, and how to help it.

The NGO Academia Para O Desenvolvimento Da Educação Brasil is a social organization located in Recife, PE. Among the activities of the NGO we have:Training for Work Defense of Social Welfare Rights Mobilization and Articulation for Education See below for the NGO s data, and how to help it.

Many institutions have information on cash donations on their website, informing the bank, agency and deposit account. If the institution does not have a website, or bank information is not available on the institutions website, contact the institution by email silvia.vidon@imip.org.br or by phone 8121224144 and check how to make cash donations. You can make a one-time donation, or become a regular donor, by donating monthly, for example.
